parameters.name: reads
parameters.label: Input files
parameters.usage: Specify the location of your input FastQ files.

parameters.name: single_end
parameters.label: Single-end sequencing input
parameters.usage: Use single-end sequencing inputs instead of paired-end.

parameters.name: genome
parameters.label: Alignment reference iGenomes key
parameters.usage: Ref. genome key for iGenomes

parameters.name: star_index
parameters.label: STAR index
parameters.usage: Path to STAR index

parameters.name: hisat2_index
parameters.label: HISAT2 index
parameters.usage: Path to HiSAT2 index

parameters.name: salmon_index
parameters.label: Salmon index
parameters.usage: Path to Salmon index

parameters.name: fasta
parameters.label: FASTA
parameters.usage: Path to Fasta reference

parameters.name: transcript_fasta
parameters.label: FASTA
parameters.usage: Path to transcript fasta file

parameters.name: splicesites
parameters.label: HISAT2 splice sites file
parameters.usage: Optional splice-sites file for building a HISAT2 alignment index

parameters.name: gtf
parameters.label: GTF
parameters.usage: Path to GTF file

parameters.name: gff
parameters.label: GFF
parameters.usage: Path to GFF3 file

parameters.name: bed12
parameters.label: BED12
parameters.usage: Path to bed12 file

parameters.name: saveReference
parameters.label: Save reference genome index
parameters.usage: Save the generated reference files to the results directory.

parameters.name: forwardStranded
parameters.label: Forward stranded
parameters.usage: Samples are made using a forward-stranded library type.

parameters.name: reverseStranded
parameters.label: Reverse stranded
parameters.usage: Samples are made using a reverse-stranded library type.

parameters.name: unStranded
parameters.label: Unstranded
parameters.usage: Force the library strandedness to be unstranded

parameters.name: clip_r1
parameters.label: Read Clipping: 5' R1
parameters.usage: Instructs Trim Galore to remove bp from the 5' end of read 1 (or single-end reads).

parameters.name: clip_r2
parameters.label: Read Clipping: 5' R1
parameters.usage: Instructs Trim Galore to remove bp from the 5' end of read 2 (paired-end reads only).

parameters.name: three_prime_clip_r1
parameters.label: Read Clipping: 3' R1
parameters.usage: Instructs Trim Galore to remove bp from the 3' end of read 1 AFTER adapter/quality trimming has been performed.

parameters.name: three_prime_clip_r2
parameters.label: Read Clipping: 3' R2
parameters.usage: Instructs Trim Galore to remove bp from the 3' end of read 2 AFTER adapter/quality trimming has been performed.

parameters.name: trim_nextseq
parameters.label: NextSeq Trimming
parameters.usage: This enables the option --nextseq-trim=3'CUTOFF within Cutadapt in Trim Galore, which will set a quality cutoff (that is normally given with -q instead), but qualities of G bases are ignored. This trimming is in common for the NextSeq- and NovaSeq-platforms, where basecalls without any signal are called as high-quality G bases.

parameters.name: pico
parameters.label: Library type: Pico
parameters.usage: Set trimming and standedness settings for the SMARTer Stranded Total RNA-Seq Kit - Pico Input kit.

parameters.name: saveTrimmed
parameters.label: Save Trimmed FastQ files
parameters.usage: Save the trimmed FastQ files to the results directory.

parameters.name: aligner
parameters.label: Alignment tool
parameters.usage: Choose whether to align reads with STAR or HISAT2

parameters.name: removeRiboRNA
parameters.label: Remove ribosomal RNA
parameters.usage: Choose whether to remove rRNA or not

parameters.name: saveNonRiboRNAReads
parameters.label: Save non-ribosomal RNA reads as FastQ to results
parameters.usage: By default, the pipeline doesn't save non-rRNA FastQ files.

parameters.name: rRNA_database_manifest
parameters.label: Specify path to rRNA database manifest file
parameters.usage: By default, the pipeline uses a predefined SILVA list. Users can specify their own if necessary.

parameters.name: pseudo_aligner
parameters.label: Pseudo alignment tool
parameters.usage: Choose whether to pseudo align reads with Salmon

parameters.name: stringTieIgnoreGTF
parameters.label: Alignment options
parameters.usage: Perform reference-guided de novo assembly of transcripts using StringTie i.e. dont restrict to those in GTF file.

parameters.name: seq_center
parameters.label: Sequencing center
parameters.usage: Add sequencing center in @RG line of output BAM header

parameters.name: saveAlignedIntermediates
parameters.label: Save Aligned Intermediate BAM files
parameters.usage: Save intermediate BAM files to the results directory.

parameters.name: fc_group_features
parameters.label: FeatureCounts Group Features
parameters.usage: By default, the pipeline uses `gene_name` as the default gene identifier group. Specifying `--fc_group_features` uses a different category present in your provided GTF file.

parameters.name: fc_group_features_type
parameters.label: FeatureCounts Group Features Biotype
parameters.usage: GTF attribute name that gives the biotype of a feature.

parameters.name: fc_extra_attributes
parameters.label: FeatureCounts Extra Gene Names
parameters.usage: By default the pipeline uses `gene_names` as additional gene identifiers apart from ENSEMBL identifiers. --fc_extra_attributes is passed to featureCounts as an --extraAttributes parameter

parameters.name: skipQC
parameters.label: Skip all QC steps, apart from MultiQC

parameters.name: skipRseQC
parameters.label: Skip RSeQC steps, apart from genebody coverage

parameters.name: sampleLevel
parameters.label: sampleLevel
parameters.usage: Turn off project-level analysis (edgeR MDS plot and heatmap).

parameters.name: outdir
parameters.label: Output directory
parameters.usage: Set where to save the results from the pipeline

parameters.name: email
parameters.label: Your email address
parameters.usage: Your email address, required to receive completion notification.

parameters.name: max_multiqc_email_size
parameters.label: Maximum MultiQC email file size
parameters.usage: Theshold size for MultiQC report to be attached in notification email. If file generated by pipeline exceeds the threshold, it will not be attached.

parameters.name: name
parameters.label: Custom run name
parameters.usage: Helper variable. Do not set, use -name instead.

parameters.name: awsregion
parameters.label: AWS Region
parameters.usage: The AWS region to run your job in.

parameters.name: awsqueue
parameters.label: AWS job queue
parameters.usage: The JobQueue that you intend to use on AWS Batch.

parameters.name: hisat_build_memory
parameters.label: HISAT2 indexing: required memory for splice sites in GB
parameters.usage: HISAT2 needs a very large amount of memory to build an index with splice sites. If the available memory is below this threshold, the index build will proceed without splicing information.

parameters.name: star_memory
parameters.label: STAR memory
parameters.usage: Instead of using the default amount available, force STAR to use a given amount of memory

parameters.name: multiqc_config
parameters.label: MultiQC Config
parameters.usage: Path to a config file for MultiQC

parameters.name: project
parameters.label: Cluster project
parameters.usage: For use on HPC systems where a project ID is required for job submission

parameters.name: igenomes_base
parameters.label: iGenomes base path
parameters.usage: Base path for iGenomes reference files

parameters.name: container
parameters.label: Software container
parameters.usage: Dockerhub address for pipeline container

parameters.name: plaintext_email
parameters.label: Plain text email
parameters.usage: Set to receive plain-text e-mails instead of HTML formatted.

parameters.name: help
parameters.label: Help
parameters.usage: Specify to show the pipeline help text.

parameters.name: max_cpus
parameters.label: Maximum available CPUs
parameters.usage: Use to set a top-limit for the default CPUs requirement for each process.

parameters.name: max_time
parameters.label: Maximum available time
parameters.usage: Use to set a top-limit for the default time requirement for each process.

parameters.name: max_memory
parameters.label: Maximum available memory
parameters.usage: Use to set a top-limit for the default memory requirement for each process.

parameters.name: tracedir
parameters.label: Trace directory
parameters.usage: Set to where the pipeline trace should be saved. Set to local path when using AWS on S3.

parameters.name: readPaths
parameters.label: Read Paths
parameters.usage: For use with nextflow config files only
